name: Winter Friends
description:
Winter Friends

Brazing a blizzard, a lone fox has arrived at the great tree borough to find its new home - but the fox is not alone. Several animals have been left behind to fight for themselves in the cold, abandoned forest. Will they be good neighbours and will memories of the past help them through the unforgiving winter?

Controls

WASD to Move

Press Space to Jump

When Stuck After a Jump Use A or D to Break Loose

Credits

Anne Christina Elsberg

Fabio Murru

Francesco Frassineti

Jesper Haderup Eiholt
